title: Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Works in the area of Software Engineering, which encompasses the development, maintenance and optimization of software solutions/applications.
   

  

* Applies scientific methods to analyse and solve software engineering problems.
* He/she is responsible for the development and application of software engineering practice and knowledge, in research, design, development and maintenance.
* His/her work requires the exercise of original thought and judgement and the ability to supervise the technical and administrative work of other software engineers.
* The software engineer builds skills and expertise of his/her software engineering discipline to reach standard software engineer skills expectations for the applicable role, as defined in Professional Communities.
* The software engineer collaborates and acts as team player with other software engineers and stakeholders.


 Works in the area of Software Engineering, which encompasses the development, maintenance and optimization of software solutions/applications.1\\. Applies scientific methods to analyse and solve software engineering problems.2\\. He/she is responsible for the development and application of software engineering practice and knowledge, in research, design, development and maintenance.3\\. His/her work requires the exercise of original thought and judgement and the ability to supervise the technical and administrative work of other software engineers.4\\. The software engineer builds skills and expertise of his/her software engineering discipline to reach standard software engineer skills expectations for the applicable role, as defined in Professional Communities.5\\. The software engineer collaborates and acts as team player with other software engineers and stakeholders.
   

  

**Job Description \\- Grade Specific**
 Has more than a year of relevant work experience. Solid understanding of programming concepts, software design and software development principles. Consistently works to direction with minimal supervision, producing accurate and reliable results. Individuals are expected to be able to work on a range of tasks and problems, demonstrating their ability to apply their skills and knowledge. Organises own time to deliver against tasks set by others with a mid term horizon. Works co\\-operatively with others to achieve team goals and has a direct and positive impact on project performance and make decisions based on their understanding of the situation, not just the rules.

title: SDE - BACKEND ENGINEER (PRODUCT INDUSTRY MUST)
description:
**About The Opportunity**
 A technology\\-driven product company in the Cloud Communications / B2B SaaS sector building scalable backend services that power multi\\-tenant SaaS products and real\\-time systems. We design secure, high\\-throughput APIs and resilient data platforms to support global customers and fast\\-growing product roadmaps.
   

  

**Primary job title (optimized): Backend Engineer**
 Role \\& Responsibilities
   

  

* Design, implement, and maintain scalable backend services and APIs for product features with a focus on reliability, performance, and security.
* Own end\\-to\\-end development for backend components: API design, data modelling, business logic, testing, and deployment.
* Build and optimize data access layers and caching strategies to meet low\\-latency SLAs for high\\-concurrency traffic.
* Collaborate with product managers, frontend engineers, and QA to translate product requirements into robust technical solutions.
* Implement observability, logging, and automated alerts; diagnose and resolve production incidents and performance bottlenecks.
* Contribute to engineering best practices: code reviews, CI/CD pipelines, documentation, and scalable architecture decisions.


**Skills \\& Qualifications**
**Must\\-Have**
* Node.js
* Python
* RESTful APIs
* Microservices
* PostgreSQL
* MongoDB
* Redis
* Docker


**Preferred**
* Kubernetes
* AWS
* GraphQL


**Additional Qualifications**
* Proven experience building backend services for product/SaaS companies and shipping customer\\-facing features.
* Strong fundamentals in data structures, algorithms, system design, and security best practices.
* Comfortable working remotely across time zones and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams.


 Benefits \\& Culture Highlights
   

  

* Fully remote role with flexible work culture and distributed engineering teams.
* Opportunity to own product\\-ready features end\\-to\\-end and influence technical roadmap.
* Learning\\-focused environment with mentorship, code reviews, and emphasis on engineering excellence.


 Skills: node.js,mongodb,python,docker,saas,django,mysql,github,redis,postgresql,microservices,restful apis

title: GenAI Developer
description:
Contract Type
   

  

 Permanent
   

  

 Country
   

  

 INDIA
   

  

 Location
   

  

 Pune
   

  

 Your opportunity
   

  

 Sidel is seeking a GenAI Developer (Agentic Systems) to join our Center of Excellence. Reporting to the IT Business Partner \\& Digital Innovation, you‚Äôll be part of a high\\-impact team shaping Sidel‚Äôs enterprise GenAI ecosystem. You will design, build, and maintain agentic, multi\\-LLM applications that power business processes across the enterprise. This role emphasizes backend engineering and AI orchestration ‚Äî leveraging Python, Azure Cloud, and GenAI frameworks to deliver secure, scalable, and high\\-performing AI services.
   

  

 Your Mission
   

  

 This resource will join the new Center of Excellence (CoE) for GenAI, driving the execution and implementation of Sidel‚Äôs GenAI strategy with a strong focus on agentic architectures, backend development, and Azure Cloud integration.
   

  

**Objectives Of The Role \\& Responsibilities**
* Architect and develop backend components for agentic GenAI platforms.
* Design and orchestrate multi\\-agent workflows using frameworks such as LangChain, Semantic Kernel, and Azure AI Foundry Agents.
* Build and deploy Python\\-based microservices and APIs integrating LLMs and enterprise data systems.
* Leverage Azure services (Azure OpenAI, Cognitive Search, Functions, Cosmos DB, App Services, Key Vault, Private Link, Monitor) to enable secure, production\\-grade solutions.
* Implement intelligent retrieval strategies (RAG pipelines, hybrid search, embeddings, and caching) for contextually\\-aware agents.
* Collaborate with Solution Architects and Business Analysts to convert business needs into AI\\-powered microservices. Contribute to prompt\\-flow optimization, model evaluation frameworks, and fine\\-tuning pipelines.
* Establish observability and governance, including telemetry, cost optimization, and traceability for GenAI agents.
* Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines, containerized deployments, and automated testing frameworks.
* Document and evangelize agentic design patterns, ensuring compliance with enterprise governance, RBAC, and privacy regulations (GDPR, AI Act).
* Partner with global teams and vendors to integrate 3rd\\-party tools, APIs, and model endpoints into Sidel‚Äôs AI ecosystem.


 Your Profile
   

  

* 3‚Äì5 years in software development, with 2\\+ years hands\\-on in GenAI, agentic systems, or AI/ML integration projects.
* Strong Python skills (FastAPI, Flask) with focus on microservices and backend architecture.
* Proficiency in GenAI frameworks (LangChain, Semantic Kernel, LlamaIndex, CrewAI, Autogen).
* Hands\\-on experience with Azure AI stack (Azure OpenAI, AI Search, Cosmos DB, Functions, App Services, Key Vault).
* Good\\-to\\-have: Familiarity with Microsoft Copilot Studio (plugin creation, custom connectors, orchestration with enterprise data).
* Solid understanding of vector databases and RAG orchestration for contextual retrieval.
* Familiarity with multi\\-agent orchestration, memory stores, and adaptive reasoning loops.
* Proficient in DevOps tooling (CI/CD, Docker/Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps).
* Knowledge of API security, private networking, and role\\-based access controls.
* Strong analytical, debugging, and optimization mindset.
* Excellent collaboration in Agile cross\\-functional teams.
* Clear communication and technical storytelling skills to explain agentic architectures in business terms.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master‚Äôs preferred).
* Bonus: Exposure to MLOps, vector database tuning, or building autonomous multi\\-agent frameworks.

title: Software Engineer I
description:
**Responsibilities**
* Application Development: Design, develop, and maintain custom applications, add\\-ons, scripts, and extensions that integrate with Google Workspace tools to address specific business needs.
* AppSheet and Cloud Development: Lead the design, development, and deployment of complex, data\\-driven business applications using Google AppSheet. Integrate these solutions with diverse data sources, Google Workspace, and advanced Google Cloud Platform services
* Integration: Integrate third\\-party services and APIs with Google Workspace applications to streamline workflows, automate processes, and enhance collaboration.
* Customization: Customize and enhance the user experience within Google Workspace applications through user interface modifications, layout adjustments, and interactive elements.
* Automation: Create and implement automation solutions using Google Workspace APIs and scripting languages (such as Google Apps Script) to optimize routine tasks and processes.
* Java/Spring Development: Design, develop, and maintain backend services and applications using Java and the Spring framework (Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Data, etc.)
* Data Management: Develop data synchronization and migration tools to move data between Google Workspace and other systems while ensuring data integrity and security.
* Security and Compliance: Implement security best practices and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations when developing applications and integrations that handle sensitive information.
* Troubleshooting and Support: Identify and resolve technical issues, bugs, and glitches related to custom applications and integrations within the Google Workspace environment.
* Collaboration: Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to gather requirements, plan development efforts, and deliver high\\-quality solutions.
* Documentation: Create documentation for applications, integrations, and codebases to facilitate future maintenance, updates, and knowledge sharing.
* Stay Updated: Keep up to date with the latest developments in Google Workspace APIs, tools, and technologies to leverage new features and capabilities.


**Skills And Qualifications**
* Preferred a degree in Computer Science or similar discipline.
* 2\\+ years plus experience in developing add ons to Google Workspace
* Proficiency in programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, or Google Apps Script.
* Strong understanding of Google Workspace applications and APIs.
* Familiarity with web development, including front\\-end and back\\-end technologies.
* Familiarity with google cloud platform, cloud computing, RESTful APIs, and data integration.
* Problem\\-solving skills to address complex technical challenges.
* Communication skills to collaborate effectively within teams and interact with stakeholders.
* Attention to detail, especially when it comes to security and data privacy considerations.
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and code review processes.


**CME Group: Where Futures are Made**
 CME Group is the world‚Äôs leading derivatives marketplace. But who we are goes deeper than that. Here, you can impact markets worldwide. Transform industries. And build a career by shaping tomorrow. We invest in your success and you own it ‚Äì all while working alongside a team of leading experts who inspire you in ways big and small. Problem solvers, difference makers, trailblazers. Those are our people. And we‚Äôre looking for more.
   

  

 At CME Group, we embrace our employees' unique experiences and skills to ensure that everyone‚Äôs perspectives are acknowledged and valued. As an equal\\-opportunity employer, we consider all potential employees without regard to any protected characteristic.
   

  

**Important Notice:** 
 Recruitment fraud is on the rise, with scammers using misleading promises of job offers and interviews to solicit money and personal information from job seekers. CME Group adheres to established procedures designed to maintain trust, confidence and security throughout our recruitment process. Learn more here.

title: Senior QA Automation Engineer (SDET)
description:
Senior SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) \\- Fintech
   

  

**Location:** 
 Bangalore (Work from Office)
   

  

**Experience:** 
 4\\+ Years
   

  

**Compensation:** 
 Up to
 **‚Çπ30,00,000 (30 LPA)**
**About The Company**
 We are a high\\-growth Fintech disruptor specializing in
 **Digital Payments and Lending Infrastructure** 
 . Our platform processes thousands of transactions per second, requiring extreme precision and security. We are looking for an elite SDET from an
 **IIT/NIT** 
 background who can build the automated "safety nets" required for a world\\-class financial ecosystem.
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Senior SDET, you will be responsible for the end\\-to\\-end automation of our financial products. You aren't just a tester; you are an engineer who builds complex tools to simulate real\\-world financial scenarios, including high\\-frequency trades, split\\-second payment reconciliations, and complex interest calculations.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Framework Development: Architect and maintain scalable automation frameworks (Selenium, Playwright, or Cypress) tailored for high\\-frequency transaction flows.
* Financial Logic Validation: Build scripts to verify complex financial arithmetic (Interest rates, EMI schedules, GST calculations, and Wallet deductions) to ensure 100% accuracy.
* API \\& Microservices Automation: Use RestAssured or Pytest to automate backend API contracts, ensuring that data moving between ledgers and gateways remains consistent.
* Performance Engineering: Use JMeter or K6 to stress\\-test the system, ensuring the payment gateway can handle massive traffic spikes during peak sale periods.
* Data Integrity: Write advanced SQL (PostgreSQL/MySQL) scripts to validate that transactions are correctly recorded in the database without any "Race Conditions."
* Security Integration: Implement automated security scans to check for vulnerabilities like SQL Injection or unauthorized API access within the CI/CD pipeline.


**Required Qualifications**
* Education: B.Tech/M.Tech from IIT or NIT is mandatory.
* Experience: 4\\+ years in software engineering/testing, with a focus on automation.
* Tech Stack: Expert proficiency in Java or Python. Experience with Playwright, Selenium, Docker, and AWS.
* Domain Knowledge: Prior experience in Fintech, Payments, or Banking is highly preferred. Understanding of ISO8583, PCI\\-DSS, or UPI flows is a huge plus.
* Analytical Mindset: Ability to identify "edge cases" in financial transactions where rounding errors or timeout issues might occur.


**Why Join Us?**
* Mission Critical: Your automation scripts protect millions of dollars in daily transactions.
* Tech\\-First Culture: We value engineering excellence and give our SDETs the autonomy to build their own tools and platforms.
* Tier\\-1 Peer Group: Collaborate with the brightest minds from the country‚Äôs top institutes.


 Skills: automation,sql,playwright,jmeter,payments,aws,java,docker,python,api,selenium

title: Quality Assurance- Mobile & Web Applications
description:
Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer ‚Äì Mobile \\& Web Applications
   

  

 Location: Pune (On\\-site / Hybrid)
   

 Experience: 2‚Äì4 Years
   

 Employment Type: Full\\-Time
   

  

 Role Objective (Very Important)
   

 The QA Engineer will be responsible for end\\-to\\-end quality assurance of SwipeLoan‚Äôs mobile apps (Android \\& iOS) and web/backend systems, ensuring stable releases, zero regression, and full traceability of testing.
   

  

 This role will work closely with in\\-house developers and external vendors to ensure only verified, tested code reaches production.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

 1Ô∏è‚É£ Test Planning \\& Execution
   

 Understand business requirements, user flows, and technical changes
   

 Prepare module\\-wise and feature\\-wise test cases
   

  

 Execute:
   

 Functional testing
   

 Regression testing
   

 Smoke testing signal
   

 Verify fixes before deployment to production
   

 Ensure complete test coverage before every release
   

  

 2Ô∏è‚É£ Mobile App Testing (Critical for You)
   

 Perform detailed testing on:
   

 Android app (Play Store)
   

 iOS app (App Store / TestFlight)
   

  

 Validate:
   

 App launch, login, onboarding, KYC flows
   

 Payments, subscriptions, loan journeys
   

 Edge cases (network failure, session expiry, OTP issues)
   

 Ensure compliance with:
   

 Google Play \\& Apple App Store guidelines (basic awareness)
   

  

 3Ô∏è‚É£ Bug Tracking \\& Ownership
   

 Log bugs with:
   

 Clear steps to reproduce
   

 Screenshots / videos
   

 Expected vs actual result
   

  

 Categorize bugs:
   

 Critical / High / Medium / Low
   

 Coordinate with developers until verified closure
   

 Ensure no bug is reopened repeatedly due to incomplete fixes
   

  

 4Ô∏è‚É£ Regression \\& Release Control (Most Important)
   

 Maintain regression test checklist
   

 Re\\-test all impacted modules for every release
   

 Provide QA sign\\-off before production deployment
   

 Maintain release notes from QA perspective
   

 ‚ö†Ô∏è No release should go live without QA confirmation.
   

  

 5Ô∏è‚É£ Vendor \\& In\\-House Team Coordination
   

 Review deliverables from:
   

 External vendors
   

 In\\-house developers
   

  

 Validate:
   

 Whether fixes are genuinely resolved
   

 Whether ‚Äúnew bugs‚Äù are side\\-effects of old code
   

 Act as a quality gatekeeper, not just a tester
   

  

 6Ô∏è‚É£ Documentation \\& Reporting
   

 Maintain:
   

 Test case documents
   

 Bug reports
   

 Release QA sign\\-off records
   

 Share test cases \\& reports via email / internal tracker
   

 Provide weekly QA status reports to management
   

 Tools \\& Skills Required
   

  

 Technical Skills:
   

 Experience in manual testing (mandatory)
   

 Experience testing mobile applications (Android/iOS) ‚Äì mandatory
   

  

 Basic understanding of:
   

 APIs (request/response, status codes)
   

 Databases (basic queries preferred)
   

 Familiarity with bug tracking tools (Jira, ClickUp, Trello, or similar)
   

  

 Nice to Have (Not Mandatory):
   

 Automation basics (Selenium/Appium ‚Äì optional)
   

 Experience in fintech / payment / KYC flows
   

 Knowledge of app store submission process
   

 Behavioral \\& Ownership Traits (Important)
   

 Strong attention to detail
   

 Ability to say ‚ÄúNO ‚Äì this is not ready‚Äù
   

 Ownership mindset (not ‚Äújust testing‚Äù)
   

 Comfortable coordinating with vendors
   

 Able to escalate issues clearly and early
   

  

 Reporting To
   

 Technology Manager / Virtual CTO
   

 Dotted line to Founder / Product Owner for release approvals
   

  

 Success Metrics (How you judge this QA)
   

 Reduction in production bugs
   

 Zero repeat bugs after deployment
   

 Stable app releases
   

 Clear test documentation for every module
   

 No vendor rework loop
   

  

 üí∞ Expected Salary Range (Pune Market ‚Äì realistic)
   

 ‚Çπ4\\.5 LPA ‚Äì ‚Çπ7 LPA (2‚Äì4 yrs solid QA)
   

 If very strong in mobile \\+ fintech: up to ‚Çπ8 LPA

title: Software Engineer III - C++, Python
description:
**Your Team's Impact** 




 We are seeking an experienced Software Engineer III with strong expertise in C\\+\\+ and basic Python to join our team. The ideal candidate will work on developing and maintaining scalable systems, contribute to CI/CD pipelines, and collaborate with global teams in a Windows\\-based environment.

* Design and develop new features, performance improvements, and refactor existing systems.
* Perform peer code reviews and provide technical guidance to team members on best coding and design practices.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams in an Agile/Scrum environment using Jira.
* Follow test\\-driven development and ensure high\\-quality, well\\-tested code delivery.
* Work on database\\-related development tasks involving SQL and PostgreSQL.
* Participate in setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
* Create and review technical documentation, test cases, and deployment procedures.
* Estimate effort for assigned tasks, track progress, and communicate effectively in daily standups and sprint reviews.
* Coordinate with global teams to ensure smooth integration and delivery of features across components.



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 




  





 Required Skills
 


* Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline.
* 3‚Äì4 years of total experience in software development, with
 **strong expertise in C\\+\\+ and basic Python.**
* Solid understanding of Object\\-Oriented Programming and Design Patterns. Proficiency with
 **SQL and PostgreSQL databases.**
* Hands\\-on experience working in Windows environments.
* Familiarity with Git\\-based workflows and CI/CD pipelines (preferably GitHub Actions).
* Strong analytical, debugging, and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities in a distributed team setup.
* Self\\-driven and organized, capable of prioritizing tasks in a fast\\-paced Agile environment.



 Desired Skills
 


* Experience integrating C\\+\\+ components with Python.
* Familiarity with scripting or automation in Windows (PowerShell, batch scripts, etc.).
* Experience in performance optimization systems.



  





**What's In It For You** 




  





 At FactSet, our people are our greatest asset, and our culture is our biggest competitive advantage. Being a FactSetter means:
 


* The opportunity to join an S\\&P 500 company with over 45 years of sustainable growth, powered by the entrepreneurial spirit of a start\\-up.
* Support for your total well\\-being. This includes health, life, and disability insurance, as well as retirement savings plans and a discounted employee stock purchase program, plus paid time off for holidays, family leave, and company\\-wide wellness days.
* Flexible work accommodations. We value work/life harmony and offer our employees a range of accommodations to help them achieve success both at work and in their personal lives.
* A global community dedicated to volunteerism and sustainability, where collaboration is always encouraged, and individuality drives solutions.
* Career progression planning with dedicated time each month for learning and development.
* Business Resource Groups open to all employees that serve as a catalyst for connection, growth, and belonging.



  





 Learn more about our benefits here.
 



  





 Salary is just one component of our compensation package and is based on several factors, including but not limited to education, work experience, and certifications.

title: Senior Go Developer
description:
About the Role
 
 We need a¬†
 **Go developer with deep WebRTC and video streaming expertise** 
 ¬†to own our real\\-time video streaming service. This is a pure Go application (\\~6,600 lines) that orchestrates WebRTC connections, RTSP streams, and media server integration.
 



**This is a software engineering role, not a hardware/firmware role.** 
 ¬†The application runs on Linux (ARM), but your day\\-to\\-day work is writing and debugging Go code, WebRTC connections, and streaming pipelines. If you don't have production Go experience or haven't worked with WebRTC/RTSP, this role is not for you.
 


 What You'll Work On
 * **WebRTC Connection Management** 
 ¬†\\- Implement and debug ICE negotiation, STUN/TURN connectivity, SDP handling, and peer connection lifecycle
* **RTSP Stream Handling** 
 ¬†\\- Integrate with IP cameras via RTSP, manage stream sessions, handle codec negotiation (H.264\\)
* **MediaMTX Integration** 
 ¬†\\- Orchestrate RTSP\\-to\\-WebRTC protocol conversion
* **Go Concurrency** 
 ¬†\\- Manage hundreds of concurrent streaming sessions using goroutines, channels, and proper lifecycle management
* **Network Debugging** 
 ¬†\\- Diagnose connectivity issues across NAT/firewall scenarios, analyze packet loss, troubleshoot latency
* **Observability** 
 ¬†\\- Structured logging with zerolog, OpenTelemetry tracing, performance metrics


 Tech Stack
 * **Language:** 
 ¬†Go 1\\.22
* **Protocols:** 
 ¬†WebRTC, RTSP, RTP/RTCP, MQTT, WebSockets
* **Key Libraries:** 
 ¬†paho.mqtt.golang, gortsplib, gorilla/websocket, zerolog, pion/webrtc
* **Media Server:** 
 ¬†MediaMTX
* **Target:** 
 ¬†Linux (ARM cross\\-compilation)


 RequirementsAbsolute Requirements (Non\\-Negotiable)
 
 You will not be considered without demonstrated experience in ALL of the following:
 


* **Production Go development (3\\+ years)** 
 ¬†\\- You must have built and maintained production Go services. We will ask about goroutines, channels, context, sync primitives, and memory management. If Go is not one of your primary languages, do not apply.
* **WebRTC protocol expertise** 
 ¬†\\- You must understand ICE candidate gathering, STUN/TURN servers, SDP offer/answer, DTLS/SRTP, and RTP/RTCP. We will ask you to explain the WebRTC connection flow in detail.
* **Video streaming experience** 
 ¬†\\- You must have worked with RTSP, RTP, or similar streaming protocols. Experience with H.264 codec handling, keyframes, and media pipelines required.
* **Network debugging skills** 
 ¬†\\- You must be comfortable with Wireshark/tcpdump, diagnosing NAT traversal issues, and troubleshooting real\\-time streaming problems.


 Nice to Have
 * Experience with MediaMTX, GStreamer, FFmpeg, or similar media servers
* MQTT protocol experience
* ARM/Linux cross\\-compilation experience
* OpenTelemetry/distributed tracing
* IoT or smart home domain knowledge


 This Role Is NOT For
 * Embedded engineers who want to learn Go (you need to already be proficient)
* Firmware developers without streaming/WebRTC background
* Backend developers without real\\-time video experience
* Anyone who hasn't worked with WebRTC in production

Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Expected to be an SME, collaborate and manage the team to perform. \\- Responsible for team decisions. \\- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions. \\- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams. \\- Facilitate knowledge sharing sessions to enhance team capabilities and foster a culture of continuous learning. \\- Monitor system performance and proactively identify areas for improvement to enhance user experience. Professional \\& Technical Skills: \\- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in ASP.NET MVC. \\- Strong understanding of web application development and architecture. \\- Experience with debugging and troubleshooting complex software issues. \\- Familiarity with database management systems and SQL. \\- Ability to work collaboratively in a team\\-oriented environment. Additional Information: \\- The candidate should have minimum 5 years of experience in ASP.NET MVC. \\- This position is based at our Coimbatore office. \\- A 15 years full time education is required.

title: Staff SW Engineer (Java Full stack, OpenSearch/Elasticsearch, 8+ years' exp)
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose ‚Äì to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose\\-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Visa‚Äôs Technology Organization is a community of problem solvers and innovators reshaping the future of commerce. We operate the world‚Äôs most sophisticated processing networks capable of handling more than 65k secure transactions a second across 80M merchants, 15k Financial Institutions, and billions of everyday people. While working with us you‚Äôll get to work on complex distributed systems and solve massive scale problems centered on new payment flows, business and data solutions, cyber security, and B2C platforms.
   

  





 The Opportunity:
   

  





 We are looking for Versatile, curious, and energetic Software Engineers who embrace solving complex challenges on a global scale. As a Visa Software Engineer, you will be an integral part of a multi\\-functional development team inventing, designing, building, and testing software products that reach a truly global customer base. While building components of powerful payment technology, you will get to see your efforts shaping the digital future of monetary transactions.
   

  





 The Responsibilities:
   

  




* Proven experience leading teams that have delivered high‚Äëquality large‚Äëscale enterprise‚Äëclass applications.
* Demonstrates relevant technical working knowledge to understand requirements.
* You are a Java expert, and you have experience with REST APIs, JSON, and exposure to container‚Äëbased technologies.
* Working experience in React and Vertx is a plus.
* Working experience with Kafka, OpenSearch/Elasticsearch is a must.
* Design, implement, and optimize complex search applications using OpenSearch or Elasticsearch, including index design, query DSL, aggregations, synonyms, analyzers, and relevance tuning.
* Develop scalable ingestion frameworks that handle high‚Äëthroughput, real‚Äëtime search indexing.
* Own search performance end‚Äëto‚Äëend: latency improvements, shard planning, cluster optimization, caching strategies, and load testing.
* Collaborate with product and engineering teams to translate business search needs into technical solutions (e.g., relevance scoring, ranking models, semantic search).
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex search issues involving distributed systems, cluster health, shards, replication, and indexing failures.
* Implement observability for search systems: monitoring, alerting, dashboards, query profiling, and cluster metrics.
* Should have very good understanding in GenAI technology and built product using any LLM.
* Hands‚Äëon experience with database technologies like MSSQL and Oracle.
* You have strong experience with Agile development incorporating Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery, utilizing technologies such as GIT, Maven, Jenkins, Chef, Sonar, JUnit.
* Ensure proper metrics instrumentation in software components to help facilitate real‚Äëtime and remote troubleshooting/performance monitoring.
* Knowledge of Unix/Linux and working in a shell environment. Understand and own component security analysis, including code and data flow review.
* Collaborate with security team to implement and verify secure coding techniques.
* Curiosity and creativity to understand customer requirements and processes and propose improvements.
* Ability to see and understand the big picture while staying focused on immediate goals.
* Strong work ethic to focus on our goals.
* Experience with Test‚ÄëDriven Development methodology.
* Proven experience as a technical leader with ability to understand requirements and independently architect, design, and build the solution.
* Passion for working with people and mentoring junior engineers.
* As an end‚Äëto‚Äëend champion for your products, strong debugging and Unix skills to help support Operations teams.
* Ability to write clean, coherent code following established coding guidelines.
* Strong interpersonal and effective communication skills (both written and verbal).
* Highly driven, resourceful, and results‚Äëoriented.



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Basic Qualifications:
   

  




* 8\\+ years of relevant work experience with a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree or with an Advanced degree.
* Java expert with experience in REST APIs, JSON, and container‚Äëbased technologies.
* Working experience with Kafka, Elasticsearch/OpenSearch, and Spark.
* Hands‚Äëon expertise with OpenSearch or Elasticsearch, including:
* Indexing strategies and schema design
* Query DSL, aggregations, full‚Äëtext search, analyzers, custom tokenization
* Cluster configuration, scaling, shard allocation, and performance tuning
* Experience with OpenSearch or Elasticsearch, or Lucene‚Äëlevel customization.
* Experience managing multi‚Äënode OpenSearch/Elastic clusters, optimizing relevancy, and resolving complex cluster issues.
* Solid knowledge of distributed systems concepts: replication, fault tolerance, data partitioning, consistency models.
* Strong understanding of GenAI technologies and experience building a product using any LLM.
* Hands‚Äëon experience with databases such as MSSQL and Oracle.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines, using tools such as GIT, Maven, Jenkins, Chef, Sonar, JUnit.
* Experience with Agile and Test‚ÄëDriven Development methodology.


**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: PHP Laravel
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Laravel Developer (3\\+ Years Experience)
   

**Job Description:** 

  





 We are looking for an experienced
 **Laravel Developer** 
 to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in developing web applications using
 **Laravel** 
 and will work on
 **CRM Systems, Loan Management Systems (LOS), Learning Management Systems (LMS), HRMS** 
 , and other web\\-based applications.
 



  




**Key Responsibilities:** 

  




1. **Development of Web Applications** 
 : Design, develop, and maintain web applications using the
 **Laravel framework** 
 for CRM, Loan Management Systems (LOS), Learning Management Systems (LMS), HRMS, and other related applications.
2. **Backend Development** 
 : Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code to handle the server\\-side logic, databases, and integrations.
3. **Database Management** 
 : Design, manage, and optimize MySQL databases, ensuring the integrity and performance of data storage for CRM, LOS, LMS, and HRMS systems.
4. **API Development** 
 : Design, implement, and maintain RESTful APIs for system integration, ensuring efficient data exchange between different platforms and modules.
5. **Front\\-End Integration** 
 : Collaborate with front\\-end developers to integrate user\\-facing elements with server\\-side logic, ensuring consistency and efficiency across web applications.
6. **Performance Optimization** 
 : Write optimized, efficient code to ensure the performance, scalability, and security of applications.
7. **Cross\\-Platform Compatibility** 
 : Ensure the web applications are fully responsive and compatible across different platforms (mobile, tablet, and desktop).
8. **Version Control** 
 : Utilize
 **Git** 
 for source code management, ensuring proper versioning, collaboration, and team workflows.
9. **Collaboration with UX/UI Teams**

10. **Testing and Debugging** 
 : Write testable, reusable, and efficient code. Conduct unit testing and debugging to ensure bug\\-free, reliable software.
11. **CI/CD Integration** 
 : Familiarity with Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) tools and workflows.
12. **Code Review \\& Documentation** 
 : Adhere to coding standards and best practices. Perform peer code reviews and maintain clear documentation of processes and codebase.
13. **Development Lifecycle** 
 : Participate in the full software development lifecycle, from planning and design to deployment and maintenance.
14. **Problem Solving** 
 : Address and resolve performance bottlenecks, bugs, and other technical challenges.



  




**Skills \\& Qualifications:** 

  




* **Experience** 
 : Minimum 3 years of experience as a Laravel Developer with hands\\-on experience in CRM systems, Loan Management Systems (LOS), Learning Management Systems (LMS), HRMS, and web application development.
* **Core Skills** 
 :
* Strong proficiency in
 **Laravel** 
 (5\\+ years preferred)
* Solid understanding of
 **PHP** 
 ,
 **Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)** 
 , and
 **design patterns**

 **MySQL** 
 (query writing, optimization, database design)

 **JavaScript** 
 frameworks (Node.js, Vue.js, React.js)
* Experience with
 **RESTful API** 
 development and integration
* **Framework \\& Technologies** 
 :
* Proficient in
 **Laravel** 
 and its ecosystem (queues, jobs, events, etc.)
* Familiar with
 **Vue.js** 
 or
 **React** 
 for front\\-end integration
* Solid knowledge of
 **HTML5, CSS3** 
 , and
 **JavaScript** 
 (ES6\\)
* Experience with
 **Git** 
 for version control
* Experience with
 **CI/CD** 
 pipelines
* **Development Tools** 
 :
* Familiarity with
 **JIRA** 
 ,
 **Trello** 
 , or other project management tools
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, DigitalOcean) and deployment tools
* **Other Skills** 
 :
* Ability to solve complex problems and deliver solutions within deadlines
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* Good understanding of web security principles and best practices



  




**Project Types:** 

  




* CRM System Development
* Loan Management System (LOS)
* Learning Management System (LMS)
* HRMS (Human Resource Management System)
* E\\-Commerce Application Development



  




**Preferred Qualifications:** 

  




* **Education** 
 : A degree in
 **Computer Science** 
 ,
 **Engineering** 
 ,
 **Information Technology** 
 , or related fields (B.Tech, B.E., MCA, M.Tech)
* **Experience in Agile Development** 
 : Familiarity with Agile methodology and Scrum process



  




**Employment Type** 
 : Full\\-time
 
  




* This version focuses more on the specific technologies and systems you mentioned (CRM, LOS, LMS, HRMS) while keeping a clear emphasis on Laravel, backend development, and web application design principles. Would you like to add or modify any other details in this description?
